title: Principal Web Developer & Engineering Manager
name: Andrew Walpole
professionalSummary: I’m a full-stack principal-level web developer and engineering leader with expertise in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and TypeScript. I excel at building responsive, accessible applications and complex digital architectures.
Proficient in both front-end and back-end development, I collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality, scalable solutions.
My leadership approach emphasizes clear communication, strategic planning, and continuous growth, ensuring that teams stay aligned and productive while meeting business goals.

workExperience.title: Director of Web Development
blurbs: Led and managed a team of five developers, delivering performant, accessible websites for the pharmaceutical industry.
Critical technical consultant for the MarTech department, fostering collaboration between developers, digital producers, and client teams.
Established and upheld our company's web development standards, ensuring consistency and quality across projects.
Advised on optimal technical solutions, ensuring clients' needs were met with efficient and scalable architectures.
Skillfully estimated project timelines, effort and resources, even amongst ambiguous and limited project details.
Designed and implemented robust and adaptable technical strategies and processes, positioning our projects for long-term success.

workExperience.title: Director of Web Development
blurbs: Led a five-member web development team to build complex, high-quality, accessible, performant client websites; maintained low-stress, low burn-out.
Developed high-performing websites using many modern web stacks including: Wordpress, Astro, Eleventy, Nuxt.js and Next.js.
Architected and led digital strategy efforts for clients; advised clients directly on adopting technologies to fit their business goals.
Consistently met rigorous timelines and partnered successfully with designers and account managers to prioritize and manage features, timelines and project budgets.
Contributed heavily to the creation and execution of the company’s future growth strategy via the Entrepreneurial Operating System (EOS).
Implemented successful transition to agile work processes, increasing project productivity and collaboration.

workExperience.title: Manager, XD & Web Development
blurbs: Led a five-member design and development team to develop user- and business-driven web-applications from concept to launch.

Architected and led development and design of a custom in-house training platform with angular.js, Contentful and Vue, saving over $300k per year over an off-the-shelf solution. Used agile processes to launch and iterate on applications quickly.

Ran low-cost “unconference” event five times, recognized as a major culture-building corporate event, accompanied by a Vue- and Firebase-based  scheduling app that streamlined event logistics and management.
Rebranded Multimedia Team to Experience Design Team, increasing its recognition and value beyond Training to support Operations, Marketing, HR, IT and Finance.
Cut six-figure budget by 25% while exceeding team goals and meeting business needs by turning strategic goals into prioritized, actionable project plans.
Developed interactive training content and assessment apps and tools to support the needs of restaurant operations and HR.

workExperience.title: Adjunct Professor, Web Development
blurbs: Built and taught HTML5 & CSS, responsive web design, JavaScript, JQuery, mobile programming concepts, and business of digital media courses.

workExperience.title: Adjunct Professor, Web Development
blurbs: Instructed students on Intermediate and Advanced ActionScript 3.0, covering comprehensive topics from fundamental programming and OOP to game development and API design.
Implemented the 5-step training methodology — Prepare, Tell, Show, Do, and Review — to structure lectures and ensure effective student engagement.
Independently designed and administered a tailored class curriculum, ensuring content relevance and student comprehension.

workExperience.title: Web & Flash Developer
blurbs: Collaborated on web integrations and managed content using HTML, CSS, XSLT, Flash, and Javascript.
Crafted branded graphics for web/print using Photoshop and Illustrator, and developed Flash Lite mobile apps.

skills2.description: Crafting and executing long-term visions and objectives for engineering teams.
Championing Agile and Lean methodologies to ensure efficient project delivery and team collaboration.
Fostering a culture of creativity and novel design approaches within engineering teams.
Rapidly bringing product ideas to life to test viability and gather feedback.
Shaping the direction and vision of engineering products, ensuring alignment with business goals.
Managing financial resources effectively, optimizing engineering project costs.
Effectively communicating technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders and providing expert advice.
Building and maintaining strong relationships across the organization.
Guiding teams through organizational changes while minimizing disruptions.
Addressing and resolving disputes in a constructive manner to maintain team harmony.
Promoting a culture of continuous growth and knowledge sharing within teams.
Championing diversity in teams and fostering an inclusive work environment.
Setting, tracking, and optimizing performance indicators for engineering projects.
Overseeing third-party relationships, ensuring quality and value.
Mastering web scripting with core JavaScript, leveraging modern ES6+ features, and ensuring type-safe code with TypeScript.
Developing web content with clear structure and design that adapts to various screen sizes.
Expertise in leading front-end frameworks and libraries for robust web applications.
Advanced techniques for optimized web page rendering and improved performance.
Specialized frameworks that provide a streamlined development experience and optimized output.
Working closely with design teams to implement intuitive and appealing user experiences.
Enhancing the speed and responsiveness of web applications for better user experience.
Ensuring web products are usable by everyone, including users with disabilities.
Utilizing JavaScript runtimes for scalable and efficient server-side applications.
Leveraging modern infrastructures for optimized, scalable, and cost-effective deployments.
Crafting interfaces for robust data exchange and integration between systems.
Building dynamic websites and web applications with popular technologies.
Integrating content management systems in a decoupled architecture for greater flexibility.
Using tools like Vite and esbuild for optimized application bundling and deployment.
Expertise in both SQL and NoSQL databases, ensuring data integrity and performance.
Utilizing platforms like Vercel, Netlify, and Cloudflare for optimal web deployment.
Managing codebase revisions and collaborations using tools like git and platforms like GitHub.
Crafting robust, scalable, and maintainable backend architectures.
Managing and configuring domain name systems for web application accessibility.
